page.home.services.first-item-content: Development of complex front-end application respecting all modern constraints (accessibility, SEO, responsive design, performance, I18N ...)
page.home.services.second-item-content: I can help you to find a technical stack in adequacy with your need and your team. I can also assist you in setting up the technical base of your project
page.home.services.third-item-content: Creation of powerful and secure APIs (REST or SOAP), authentication services, database architecture and integration with external services (mailing, hosting ...)
